content: crochet adult keyhole scarf- an easy and adjustable free crochet pattern for a textured adult crochet keyhole scarf i have made it in soft shades for the samples but it would good in most colours the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 6 x 40 inches level intermediate copyright ©2024 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-keyhole-scarf-pattern/
